item.title: What is socialism, communism, and capitalism?
item.description: What is socialism, communism, and marxism? You have probably heard these terms, but many people don’t have a concrete understanding of what they mean. Socialism isn’t simply when the government provides social safety nets or benefits, and communism isn’t about taking all of your stuff away. Socialism has significantly improved the lives of many people across the world, uplifted millions out of poverty, and lead to a higher standard of living.
